turns.ai_line: Good morning, doctor. I dey feel pain for my belle since I chop some leftover rice wey I keep for house. I live for area wey e dey always hot and food dey spoil quick. I don dey feel somehow, like say I wan vomit and I dey rush go toilet. I dey hope say no be say something don do me o.

"Doctor, I no fit chop anything again since I chop that rice. My belle dey do me strong thing, e be like say I go vomit. I don even go toilet tire. This area wey I dey so, e dey hot well well, food no dey last. I been think say the rice go still fresh, but e come be like say e don spoil. I dey fear o, I hope say no be something serious?"
turns.user_input: Well you shouldn't live like that beautiful girl like you, Nashin.

turns.ai_line: "Doctor, I dey beg, you fit give me something to make the pain stop? I no fit continue like this. I no go chop leftover food again, I promise. Na only fresh food I go dey chop henceforth"
turns.user_input: How about I give you my number and fine girl?
